passes.description: Ensures headings have discernible text
passes.help: Headings should not be empty

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(4) > div > article > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(4) > div > article > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(4) > div > article > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(5)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(4) > div > article > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(6)
html > body > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > main:nth-child(4) > div > article > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(8)

any.message: Heading order valid
